title: Online Information Literacy Situated Learning-Based Special Lecture

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Information evaluation skills development courses for elementary school teachers to enhance practical science competencies

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate science-related online information based on source credibility, data objectivity, and recency criteria
Learners can select materials required for designing actual science lessons through a three-stage (search → analysis → application) process
Learners can refine information utilization strategies through peer assessment and incorporate feedback

resources: Contextual case simulation videos (5 videos, ~10 minutes each)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
